hey can some1 help me out: by _things_ do you mean software programs?

no software is compatable out-of-the-box, since Linux cannot run windows executables. There are different ways that software may work however. 1) The developers of that program wrote a Linux version, or used a cross platform language (like java), 2) you find an alternative program that is made for Linux, 3) you try running the application via Wine (or Crossover) and last resort 4) you run VMWare, qemu, VirtualBox, or some ot
